
# The lineage of VISP

The Visible Speech platform has two origins. Technically, most of the VISP is built up around what is now named the Emu Speech Data Management System [@Winkelmann:2017cl]. 

In VISP we provde access to the fascilities of the [@R-emuR] [@winkelmann2015managing]

```{r echo=FALSE}

DT::datatable(reindeer::DSPP)

```

```{r}
library(dygraphs)
lungDeaths <- cbind(mdeaths, fdeaths)

 X <- data.frame(d=rnorm(100,mean = 200,sd = 50),row.names = 1:100)


dygraph(X)

```
